Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Ashland
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Rosemont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
